snippet.title: ExoSphere Gameplay [Android] - Indie Corner
snippet.description:
I'm typically not a big fan of gyroscope based games, but this is pretty awesome. The game was made by a small company called Oddbrew Games, please show them support, I'll leave a link below. 

Google Play: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=trotterj.ExoSphere

Take control of rolling your exo ball using fluid tilt controls to navigate hazardous 3D environments.
Explore the world in adventure mode. Morph the exo ball to adapt the way you can interact with the environment. Use your skills and your wits to solve devious puzzles while rolling clear of danger.

Looking for something a little more fast paced? Challenge your reflexes on the endless tunnel runner and see how far your ball roller skills can take you while racking up points for maxing your speed and going aerial.

- Full tilt roller ball action game
- Endless fun in the tunnel runner game mode
- Challenging puzzles to solve
- Awesome realistic physics and physics based puzzles
- Different exo ball morphs to collect

Keep on rolling!
